resources.string: The station has either a rail crossing or steep ramps and assistance from a companion, carer, friend, relative or support worker may be required to access the station. \n\n Do you want to call or SMS Queensland Rail for assistance?

The station has stairs access to the entry or to one or more of the platforms. You may not be able to access the station even with assistance and you may need to find an alternative route. \n\n Do you want to call or SMS Queensland Rail for assistance?
